attributes.action: Scrap the proposed £15 charge on top of speeding fines
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Yet again Motorists are being penalised by this Government, it's about time they stopped and punish the people who deserve it i.e Criminals!

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps several in existence already -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Speeding-Review/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
